sentences.sContent: And if we take this biological view of life and try to live according to the seasons, no one but a conceited fool or an impossible idealist can deny that human life can be lived like a poem.

sentences.sCn: 如若我们持此种生物学的观点来看待人生，并尝试依照时节来生活，除了自以为是的傻瓜和令人难以忍受的理想主义者之外，没有人能否认人生的美妙如诗。
